summary: Tested the blood collection workflow fix for demo data. All 5 features verified successfully - eligible donors display with Select button, dialog opens correctly showing donor info and hemoglobin, and most importantly, starting collection does NOT show 'screening not done' error. The fix to demo_seeder.py properly creates completed screenings with eligibility_status='eligible' for donors ready for collection.
seed_data_creation: Demo seeder creates 5 donors (PDN-D-2024021 to PDN-D-2024025) with completed screenings ready for collection
context_for_next_testing_agent: Blood collection workflow is fully functional. Tested with donors PDN-D-2024021 and PDN-D-2024022 - both successfully started and completed collections. The demo seeder fix properly creates completed screenings with eligibility_status='eligible'. Donation IDs DON-2026-00017 and DON-2026-00018 created during testing.

features_tested.admin_login: ✓ PASS - Login with admin@pdn.gov.my / Admin@123 successful
features_tested.collection_page_loads: ✓ PASS - Shows 30 total donors, 30 eligible, with Select buttons
features_tested.select_button_works: ✓ PASS - Clicking Select opens Blood Collection dialog
features_tested.dialog_shows_donor_info: ✓ PASS - Dialog displays donor name, ID, blood group, hemoglobin value
features_tested.start_collection_no_error: ✓ PASS - Collection started successfully WITHOUT 'screening not done' error
features_tested.complete_collection: ✓ PASS - Collection completed, Unit ID BU-2026-000011 generated
features_tested.target_donors_visible: ✓ PASS - All 5 target donors (PDN-D-2024021 to PDN-D-2024025) visible in table

notes: The fix resolved the data integrity issue where donation records were blocked because screenings were not properly linked. Demo seeder now creates completed screenings with eligibility_status='eligible' for donors ready for collection.
